refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns a value that indicates if the number of threads available in upcoming parallel regions can be adjusted by the run time.

listitem.para: Output argument (A nonzero value means threads will be dynamically adjusted.)

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This function returns a value that indicates if the number of threads available in upcoming parallel regions can be adjusted by the run time.
This function in turn calls the omp_get_dynamic function of omp library in C.
